AS/400 Center of Excellence

IBMi Solutions

Optimizing and modernizing critical legacy infrastructure for Banking, Finance, and Logistics.

Deep Expertise in Legacy Systems

We have a well-established IBMi (AS/400) practice, backed by a team of skilled system administrators and developers with deep experience in managing likely regulated environments. Whether you’re looking to modernize legacy systems or ensure compliance, we have the expertise you need.

Modernization Services

Leverage our expertise to modernize your legacy AS/400 systems, integrating them with newer technologies.

Custom Development

Creating custom applications using RPGLE, COBOL, JSON, and Web Services on the IBMi platform.

SYNON Development

Specialized in creating custom applications using the SYNON CASE tool to generate RPGLE and COBOL code.

Corporate Training

Our experts provide SYNON corporate training, and SYNON server access is available.

Administration

Continuous optimization, security, and management to ensure smooth and uninterrupted operations.

Support Services

Troubleshooting, proactive monitoring, and patch management for peak performance.
